G

GAME_FULL - Static variable in class kalaha.Errors
Is returned when a client tries to connect to an already full game.
GAME_NOT_FULL - Static variable in class kalaha.Errors
Is returned when a client tries to make a move but the game is missing player(s).
gameEnded() - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Checks if the Kalaha game has ended.
gameIsFull() - Method in class server.KalahaServer
Checks of both player have connect to this game.
GameState - Class in kalaha
Represents a game state in the Kalaha board game.
GameState() - Constructor for class kalaha.GameState
Creates a start game state for a new Kalaha game.
GameState(int[], int) - Constructor for class kalaha.GameState
Creates a game state from a board representation.
GameState(String) - Constructor for class kalaha.GameState
Creates a game state from a string board representation received from the game server.
getClientXpos() - Static method in class ai.Global
Used by the GUI to find where to place a new client window.
getFirstChild() - Method in class ai.TreeNode
 
getInstance() - Static method in class server.KalahaServer
 
getInstance() - Static method in class server.ServerGUI
Singleton class.
getMove(GameState) - Method in class ai.AIClient
This is the method that makes a move each time it is your turn.
getNextPlayer() - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Returns the next player to make a move.
getNextSibling() - Method in class ai.TreeNode
 
getNoValidMoves(int) - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Returns the number of possible valid moves (non-empty ambos) for the specified player in this game state.
getRandom() - Method in class ai.AIClient
Returns a random ambo number (1-6) used when making a random move.
getRandom() - Method in class client.RandomClient
Returns a random ambo number (1-6) used when making a random move.
getRoot() - Method in class ai.MinimaxTree
 
getScore() - Method in class ai.TreeNode
 
getScore(int) - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Returns the score (number of seeds in the house) for a player.
getSeeds(int, int) - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Returns the number of seeds for the specified ambo and player.
getWinner() - Method in class kalaha.GameState
Returns the winner for this Kalaha game.
Global - Class in ai
Contains some global constants to be used by the minimax game tree.
Global() - Constructor for class ai.Global
